answers.answer: Ugh Im sorry I git sent to the hospital after an appointment its horrible they wait to last min to feed if they do its not good food always lol. I hope you get food mama

question: My doctor sent me to the hospital because i have preeclampsia. She said they will monitor me. And depending on what they see i will deliver today or in a week. At 37 weeks. And i was like alrighty.Im going to stop and get hot wings first. She was like no. Uhh. Im hungry. Dont tell me no. So.. my stepmom... she didnt get me hot wings.. im laying here starving. Kill me.
title: ugh.
